definition: Xue Baochai, female character in Dream of Red Mansions, married to Jia Baoyu 賈寶玉|贾宝玉
surname Xue/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC)
wormwood like grass (classical)
jewel/gem/treasure/precious
hairpin

sentences.english: For example, Lin is sensitive; Xue Baochai is tough.
sentences.chinese: 林黛玉的敏感，薛寶釵的堅強。

sentences.english: The core factor of XUE Ba0-chai's cultural personality is "moderation".
sentences.chinese: 薛寶釵文化人格的核心因素是“中庸”。

sentences.english: Xue Baochai is "cool beauty" in "Dream of Red Mansions".
sentences.chinese: 薛寶釵是《紅樓夢》中的“冷美人”。

definition: Jia Baoyu, male character in The Dream of Red Mansions, in love with his cousin Lin Daiyu 林黛玉 but obliged to marry Xue Baochai 薛寶釵|薛宝钗
to make far-fetched claims (idiom)/to offer outlandish explanations
witticism
The Story of the Stone, another name for A Dream of Red Mansions 紅樓夢|红楼梦[Hong2 lou2 Meng4]
to go for a trip in spring
lit. draw legs on a snake (idiom); fig. to ruin the effect by adding sth superfluous/to overdo it
Nalan Xingde (1655-1685), Manchu ethnic Qing dynasty poet
Romance of the West Chamber by Wang Shifu 王實甫|王实甫[Wang2 Shi2 fu3]
sonnet
shameful performance/disgraceful situation
forged book/book of dubious authenticity/misattributed book/Apocrypha
to put on an attitude/to pose
to tease/to poke fun at

postmodernism
